content: अमानुष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (षी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Not human, not belonging to man, supernatural, unearthly, superhuman; आकृतिरेवानुमापयत्यमानुषतां <ls>K. 132</ls>; °आकृतिः <ls>K. 131</ls>, <ls n="K.">132</ls>, <ls n="K.">258</ls>; °शक्तित्वं <ls n="K.">103</ls>; °गीतध्वनिं <ls n="K.">126</ls> an unearthly melody. {@--2@} Inhuman, monster-like; ill-disposed towards man. {@--3@} Tenantless, desolate; °षं वनं <ls n="K.">135.</ls> --षः , --षी One not a man, an irrational animal; <ls>Ms. 9. 284</ls>, <ls>Ś. 5. 22.</ls>
